column1: Smoque BBQ////Smoque gets 5 stars because not only is everything on their menu delishible but they have "seaters" who find you a table and reassure you that when your food is ready
column2: you will be able to sit. This is huge. It's like Hot Dougs in that respect
column3: which to me shows you care about your customers. My biggest pet peeve is people who sit down to save a seat for their group before the group has ordered their food. So people who have already ordered but don't have someone to save a seat have to stand around and wait. Don't do this
column4: you are an asshole if you do this.
